title: Delicate Diamond-Studded Nalla Pusala Danda
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Crafted with Hyderabadi precision and polish.
features: This exquisite Mangalsutra features a delicate strand of traditional black onyx beads interspersed with subtly radiant, diamond-studded rose gold pendants. The pendants are modern interpretations of traditional South Indian motifs, creating a contemporary yet culturally rich design.
occasions: or small family functions. Suitable for modern brides looking for a lightweight and stylish Mangalsutra option.
description: A beautiful blend of tradition and modernity. The rose gold accents provide a contemporary twist to the classic Nalla Pusala Danda, making it versatile for daily wear. The high-quality CZ diamonds offer a brilliant sparkle without the high cost, ensuring both elegance and affordability. Represents marital bliss and protection, a cherished symbol for new brides.
